TrumpTheSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
TrumpTheSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [R] times. NL (Deal !ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

TrumpTheSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

TrumpTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: for each loop x2
TrumpTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
TrumpTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

TrumpTheSpire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
